storyInfo: Team Rainbow and the manager of the Rhodes Island Safe House reach a cooperative agreement to shelter the displaced Infected, but the mercenaries and invaders give pursuit.

attributes.content: Guns? Mercenaries?
attributes.name: Drudge

attributes.content: What are you babbling about?
attributes.name: Drudge

attributes.content: I'm telling the truth, Boss! They've got huge guns! They killed Jarman!
attributes.name: Mercenary

attributes.content: Mercenaries with big guns? Are they Sankta?
attributes.name: Drudge

attributes.content: Are you telling me you blew your mission over four Sankta?
attributes.name: Drudge

attributes.content: I don't think they're Sankta... probably...?
attributes.name: Mercenary

attributes.content: They're not Sankta but they're mercs carrying around big guns?
attributes.name: Drudge

attributes.content: If you're gonna lie to me, at least make it believable.
attributes.name: Drudge

attributes.content: He's telling the truth.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: What do you mean he's telling the truth?
attributes.name: Drudge

attributes.content: He's telling the truth. They were heavily armed, but they really weren't Sankta.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Jarman took one in the brain, but I didn't see an arrow or a bolt. Sarkaz aren't that weak.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: These ones weren't part of your plan.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Having to deal with a bunch of fully armed mercenaries was not in the contract, boss, we need a raise.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: And where are they now?
attributes.name: Drudge

attributes.content: They're not in the Infected quarter anymore. Our men are looking for them, but we haven't seen any major movements. They should still be in the area.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: How's the old bastard doing?
attributes.name: Drudge

attributes.content: Your father's people are tough. Especially that little sister of yours.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: We bumped off some of their fighters, but we haven't been able to breach the manor perimeter.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Your scientist's monsters are doing good work out there, but your casters suck. We lost a lot of them already, without getting much for them.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Those are already the best money can buy.
attributes.name: Drudge

attributes.content: Until your boss is willing to send us a caster, you're in no position to complain.
attributes.name: Drudge

attributes.content: Then get your scientist to cook up some more monsters.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Or change tactics. That mansion is a fortress, and a direct attack isn't going to work. And it's not like your sister is an easy target either.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: What about the old bastard himself? Is he still holed up in the house?
attributes.name: Drudge

attributes.content: I haven't seen your father yet. No sign of him at all since we showed up.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Hahaha... I knew it.
attributes.name: Drudge

attributes.content: I knew something happened to him!
attributes.name: Drudge

attributes.content: Keep watching the manor. Tell me as soon as you've got news.
attributes.name: Drudge

attributes.content: What about the 'change our tactics' part? You're getting ahead of yourself.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Call it a Sarkaz mercenary's intuition. The longer you drag things out, the more chances they have to go wrong.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: I have a contingency plan. I just need time to put it together.
attributes.name: Drudge

attributes.content: Confident as I am in the results of my experiments, the look on your face tells me you don't share my assessment.
attributes.name: Levi

attributes.content: Come, tell me, where have things gone wrong this time?
attributes.name: Levi

attributes.content: I need progress from you.
attributes.name: Drudge

attributes.content: Would you like to offer something a little more constructive? Or is your pointless needling all you have?
attributes.name: Levi

attributes.content: I gave you enough corpses. I need at least twenty monsters.
attributes.name: Drudge

attributes.content: Originiutants.
attributes.name: Levi

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Drudge

attributes.content: These 'monsters' are Originiutants. They have a name.
attributes.name: Levi

attributes.content: Mutants, Originiutants, why should I care what they're called?
attributes.name: Drudge

attributes.content: Give me more monsters.
attributes.name: Drudge

attributes.content: I gave you so many already. Did you get them all killed so quickly?
attributes.name: Levi

attributes.content: I'm curious... How are your minions using the Originiutants? Do they rely on your 'Originium Arts'?
attributes.name: Levi

attributes.content: What is it exactly? Super powers? Occult mysticism? Magic? Where does it come from?
attributes.name: Levi

attributes.content: Come, satisfy my curiosity. I must speak with your 'casters'.
attributes.name: Levi

attributes.content: Just do your job, egghead.
attributes.name: Drudge

attributes.content: You don't need to be thinking about Originium Arts right now.
attributes.name: Drudge

attributes.content: Once we're done here, you'll have plenty of time for your own research.
attributes.name: Drudge

attributes.content: (Russian) I have very little confidence in your project.
attributes.name: Levi

attributes.content: But speaking of time, did I not tell you? Yours is, in fact, limited.
attributes.name: Levi

attributes.content: What are you talking about?
attributes.name: Drudge

attributes.content: The lifespan of these Originiutants won't exceed one week. Whatever it is you have to do, you'll have to do it quickly.
attributes.name: Levi

attributes.content: What are you trying to pull?!
attributes.name: Drudge

attributes.content: This is the price for your lack of patience.
attributes.name: Levi

attributes.content: You want the Originiutants produced quickly, you want them tremendously powerful, and at the same time you want them to have no weaknesses?
attributes.name: Levi

attributes.content: Do you truly believe such a thing is possible?
attributes.name: Levi

attributes.content: I told you. No tricks, egghead.
attributes.name: Drudge

attributes.content: I'm busy. I have no time to joke with you.
attributes.name: Levi

attributes.content: If you are so dissatisfied with my work, I suggest you take matters into your own hands. Use your own ingenuity to solve these genetic engineering complications that I, as a professional, can't solve in so little time.
attributes.name: Levi

attributes.content: Of course, you could bring me more materials, give me more time, and make your own contributions to this vapid family drama you're putting on.
attributes.name: Levi

attributes.content: Science is fair. You always have a choice.
attributes.name: Levi

attributes.content: That's enough of your slippery talking.
attributes.name: Drudge

attributes.content: Get back to work, egghead. Don't expect any mercy out of me if you fail.
attributes.name: Drudge

attributes.content: The price of failure is a slow and miserable death. I'm a man of my word.
attributes.name: Drudge

attributes.content: Hah hah hah. When you put it like that, what else can I say?
attributes.name: Levi

attributes.content: Good luck, my friend.
attributes.name: Levi

attributes.content: There's so much smoke and chaos. Don't even need to get close to know what's going on.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Never expected a riot of this scale here...
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Butting our horns in is sure to cause problems.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: ...I'm back.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: Oh? What's the situation?
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: ...It's out of control. There's constant fighting around a mansion on the north side of town. Looks like mercenaries on one side.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: Things are even worse outside the manor. Bloodstains and collapsing houses everywhere.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: There's infected sand beasts scurrying through the alleyways, and there's a lot of them.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: If it's gotten that bad, where's the Sargon military? The Lord Ameer's forces?
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: There are some armed guards in that manor on the north side, but I didn't see any other Sargon soldiers.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: So it's been like this for two days? Then I wonder if the watchman at the safehouse is okay...
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: It doesn't look good.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Let's not jump to conclusions.
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: ...In other news, I found the safehouse.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: Some people have taken up guarding it, but they're not Rhodes Island personnel.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: It's been occupied by the mercenaries?
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: No... not exactly. They don't look like typical mercs.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: Their defensive positioning is extremely specialized. They have ambush killzones, traps, and decoys all set up.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: Most importantly, they've got a lot of townsfolk in that safehouse.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: Townsfolk? Just what kind of people do they have guarding the safehouse?
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: They look pretty much like you. They've got guns.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: Guns? Blacksteel mercenaries?
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: They don't have any obvious markings on them. I can't say for sure they're Blacksteel.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: Armed professionals stripped of any identifying markings... with guns.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Oof... my head hurts.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: There are a lot of forces at work in this town.
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: We can rule out a bandit raid.
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: And if the Lord Ameer's forces are missing, it's not an act of war.
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: The situation here... Far more complicated than I thought.
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: If they're willing to protect civilians in the middle of a riot, they can't exactly be evil.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Maybe we should try to make contact?
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Let's be careful. There are a lot of possibilities here, even if we just look at them protecting the townsfolk.
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: I just hope they're the type you can reason with.
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: What's the situation?
attributes.name: Frost

attributes.content: No good. I can't make sense of it.
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: This thing looks like a circuit board, but it's totally different from any circuit I've ever seen.
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: If you gave me a month and a technical manual, I'm still not sure I could figure it out.
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: Screw it. I'm going to stand guard upstairs. I've been squatting so long my back is sore.
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: Good hustle, Lord.
attributes.name: Frost

attributes.content: No good?
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: None of us have ever seen anything like the tech inside this comms equipment.
attributes.name: Frost

attributes.content: I don't think we're going to be able to get it working.
attributes.name: Frost

attributes.content: You wouldn't know it from the outside. It looks like your typical transmitter.
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: Just like with the van back there, the energy they use in this world is unique. All their technology is based on this stuff called Originium.
attributes.name: Frost

attributes.content: You're still studying that communicator, huh?
attributes.name: Occphen

attributes.content: Originium comms equipment uses some really complicated tech. Rhodes Island always had to send engineering casters out to maintain it. I'm not surprised you can't fix it.
attributes.name: Occphen

attributes.content: You said before you used this device to send out a distress signal?
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: Oh... I'm not sure if the signal actually got through.
attributes.name: Occphen

attributes.content: When the rioters attacked the safehouse, I hit the communicator as quick as I could. But they broke in before I got to talk to anyone.
attributes.name: Occphen

attributes.content: Everything happened so fast, I could barely speak... It could be the Rhodes Island operator who took the call couldn't even hear me.
attributes.name: Occphen

attributes.content: So the cavalry isn't coming.
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: I was never waiting for the cavalry.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: You don't look worried at all.
attributes.name: Occphen

attributes.content: You could say we're pretty used to fighting without backup.
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: Wow. I'm thinking if you had shown up just a little later, I'd be spending the rest of my life in a wheelchair.
attributes.name: Occphen

attributes.content: Or maybe a coffin.
attributes.name: Occphen

attributes.content: All I can say is thanks.
attributes.name: Occphen

attributes.content: Not necessary. You've done a lot to help the civilians yourself.
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: Well, I wouldn't make a big deal out of that. Treating the Infected is kind of Rhodes Island's business. Hahaha...
attributes.name: Occphen

attributes.content: ...Even if I'm just a reserve Logistics Operator serving as a doorman.
attributes.name: Occphen

attributes.content: Treating...? Does that mean there's medical supplies here?
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: But what are these weapons for?
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: Oh, well...
attributes.name: Occphen

attributes.content: Rhodes Island is mainly a pharmaceutical company, but this safehouse doesn't actually offer any treatment services.
attributes.name: Occphen

attributes.content: Safehouses are mostly to provide combat operators with supplies, equipment, weapons and stuff when they're out on missions.
attributes.name: Occphen

attributes.content: Right......
attributes.name: Frost

attributes.content: Hold on. What's this?
attributes.name: Frost

attributes.content: Is this a grenade launcher?
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: Grenade?
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: Let me see.
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: Oh, my. Is this a landmine?
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: And you've got all kinds.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: ...I thought the people here didn't use thermal weapons.
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: The structure of this grenade launcher is a little strange.
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: There's no propellant charge for the grenades. Does it use compressed gas?
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: Look, here's a model using hydraulic springs.
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: Be careful! That box is full of Originium explosives! It's dangerous.
attributes.name: Occphen

attributes.content: Mr. Occphen, do you have ammunition for small arms here?
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: Small arms...? Do you mean guns? Oh, are you asking about etched ammo?
attributes.name: Occphen

attributes.content: We wouldn't usually have anything that valuable in a safehouse like this. Rhodes Island combat personnel rarely use guns.
attributes.name: Occphen

attributes.content: Can we use these explosives?
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: Just be careful. Originium explosives are very dangerous.
attributes.name: Occphen

attributes.content: They used to only be for combat operators.
attributes.name: Occphen

attributes.content: But you look like you know what you're doing. I won't stop you.
attributes.name: Occphen

attributes.content: Thank you very much.
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: What about these? What are these wild looking parts for?
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: Backup casting units. Don't break them.
attributes.name: Occphen

attributes.content: Casting units...?
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: Must be for that 'Originium Arts' stuff.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: Originium Arts is the technique that lets them throw those fireballs?
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: We're getting into the weeds here. I'm no caster.
attributes.name: Occphen

attributes.content: But Originium Arts comes in all kinds of flavors. Every caster has his own specialty.
attributes.name: Occphen

attributes.content: Would the engineering casters you mentioned before be one of those?
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: Huh? Have you never seen Arts before?
attributes.name: Occphen

attributes.content: Well... we haven't seen much.
attributes.name: Frost

attributes.content: But how? You've got guns. Aren't you casters?
attributes.name: Occphen

attributes.content: A gun user who can't use Originium Arts? Now that's rare.
attributes.name: Occphen

attributes.content: Oh, Mr. Occphen, your leg hasn't healed yet. I don't want you walking around.
attributes.name: Miarow

attributes.content: I'm fine, I've got my crutches. I can walk a few steps.
attributes.name: Occphen

attributes.content: Doctor, how are the patients doing down there?
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: I've got most of the wounded stabilized, thanks to the medical supplies here.
attributes.name: Miarow

attributes.content: You don't look so hot. Are you okay?
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: I just haven't slept at all. I'll be fine.
attributes.name: Miarow

attributes.content: You need rest. We'll be in big trouble if we lose our only doctor.
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: Don't worry, I'll be careful.
attributes.name: Miarow

attributes.content: Speaking of Originium Arts.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: Don't they have some kind of magic where you say a spooky incantation and there's a big flash of light and... PRESTO! You're all healed up?
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: Erm...
attributes.name: Miarow

attributes.content: What are you talking about? Hahaha...
attributes.name: Miarow

attributes.content: No, then? What about like a healing potion that you drink it and all your wounds close right up? None of that either?
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: That's the stuff of sci-fi novels.
attributes.name: Occphen

attributes.content: There are Arts that can heal wounds, but they're a very difficult type of Arts to master.
attributes.name: Miarow

attributes.content: Before you can master healing Arts, you first have to have a complete understanding of medical science, you have to know the anatomical structures of all the different races, things like that...
attributes.name: Miarow

attributes.content: Also, most healing Arts users can only stop bleeding or speed up wound recovery.
attributes.name: Miarow

attributes.content: These Arts are very useful on the operating table, but in my experience they're no substitute for real medical skill.
attributes.name: Miarow

attributes.content: Doctor, can you use Arts?
attributes.name: Occphen

attributes.content: I have a little knowledge... not very useful though.
attributes.name: Miarow

attributes.content: That's boringly realistic... *sigh*.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: To think a world with magic could be so inconvenient.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: Hold up, did you just say 'sci-fi novels'?
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: Now I'm extra curious what your world's sci-fi novels talk about.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: Would we find a bookstore in a bigger city? Maybe some history books too? Are books expensive?
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: I've gotten myself all worked up now.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: You're a weird bunch.
attributes.name: Occphen

attributes.content: Where are you from anyway? Columbia? Victoria?
attributes.name: Occphen

attributes.content: You talk like you're Victorians, but like from a couple decades ago...
attributes.name: Occphen

attributes.content: Well... I'm not really sure how to answer that one.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: Miss Cohen and her friends came from very far away. From a place where Oripathy doesn't even exist.
attributes.name: Miarow

attributes.content: What??
attributes.name: Occphen

attributes.content: ...Yeah, that.
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: A country with no Oripathy? Really?
attributes.name: Occphen

attributes.content: No Oripathy, no Infected, that means no discrimination? A place with no hatred, where everyone's equal?
attributes.name: Occphen

attributes.content: Lordy loo. What kind of paradise is that?
attributes.name: Occphen

attributes.content: *Sigh*...
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: ...Alright then. Your faces say it all. Just pretend I never asked...
attributes.name: Occphen

attributes.content: We're under attack!
attributes.name: Frost

attributes.content: Sitrep!
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: This is just the first wave. They have us surrounded.
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: They were probing us with those earlier strikes.
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: We've got more incoming!
attributes.name: Frost

attributes.content: Your traps?
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: All good!
attributes.name: Frost

attributes.content: Watch your explosives.
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: Blitz, keep an eye on the left flank. Don't let them get the drop on us.
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: Understood.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: Lord, conserve your ammo!
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: No problem. Let them come.
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: Watch for surprise attacks!
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: Let's see what they've got.
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: Here they come!
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: Hold your fire... let them get a little closer.
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: Nine o'clock!
attributes.name: Frost

attributes.content: Lord, the enemy's up, dead ahead!
attributes.name: Frost

attributes.content: Enemy down!
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: These big guys with the horns are tough. Go for headshots!
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: Ash! Over there!
attributes.name: Frost

attributes.content: What is that?!
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: Lord! Be careful!
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: (Russian profanity)!
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: Alexsandr!!
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: I'm okay!
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: Don't worry about me! Hold the line!
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: What on earth is this!
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: Watch out for those mutants! Light cover's no good!!
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: That's a proper formation. Those four know what they're doing.
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: Sounds like gunfire... No... Those are more intense shots. That's a big, rapid-fire gun.
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: They're surrounded.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: It's the same mercenaries who were attacking the manor.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: Those monsters remind me of what we saw in Lungmen.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: The 'Host' and the 'Herd.'
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: But they're not really the same.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Mercenaries carrying big guns and mercenaries commanding mysterious monsters...
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: The situation is changing. And the balance is about to break.
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: ...What do we do?
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: Don't hestiate. Prepare for battle.
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: Those vile beings who drivie this kind of monsters into battles deserve not a single bit of mercy.
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: Roger.
attributes.name: Schwarz
